posts.post_content:
Posted By: Robert {Bigb13}
Hello, I am looking for any error cards I can find. Like blank back, ghost images, double printing, missing colors, anything. If you have any to sell let me know. Rob   (Bigb13)

Posted By: Jim T
I have a Dubuc - Cincinnati that is missing the red (makes for a neat looking card).  It is in P-F condition becuase significant corner wear and some chipping on the border but the image is strong and really presents well.  

I am only interested in trading for F-G T206's that I need.  Let me know if you are interested and I will send a scan.

Posted By: Joe Jones
